extendedInfo.description: KAPOW - a game provides a new way to communicate!Have you already felt bored with the old ways to say hello? Rather than phone call, SMS, facebook and twitter, KAPOW gives you a brand new interesting way to say hello to your friends. And furthermore, an addictive game.In the game, you will select one of your friends from your phone contacts, and then, tap the screen to choose angle and power, strike! But itâs not over yet. You will ride on him to collect items. Then use the items â missle, thunder, or even a whole plane to hit him, to make him fly higher and further. But be careful! The birds in the sky may hit you! So tap the screen to jump to avoid this.Use your items wisely, to make him fly further. Collect coins in the sky and buy weapons. Gain experience to level up, get stronger and additional strikes. And much more!When he finally falls to the ground, you will catch up with him and make a glorious victory gesture. Â­Why not share this picture with him? You can choose, either send an MMS/kik to your friend or share it on your facebook, twitter or other platforms to let others know what had happened between you and him.We will continuously update the game. More features will be added. You will have chance to âsayâ more to your friends by playing this game. Features List:* A brand new way to communicate with people: Use a real game experience.* Share anytime: When something great is happening in the game, or after the game.* Share to any social platform: Kik, Facebook, Twitter, and much more.* Directly send MMS to the friend you played with: No internet needed. And this show him/her how you concerned about him/her. Then he/she can beat you back!* An addictive game: A classic game with a lot of new innovations. Intense and Addictive.* Continuously Updates: We will update the game regularly to make it more interesting and addictive.* Great graphics and music: We concerned about any tiny details.* FREE is the best thing!Disclaimer:Our game will read your phone's contacts list only for you to select a friend from it as opponent in game, and send MMS message to him/her for you if you choose to.Our game will NOT send or store any of your private information(including but not limited to, Phone's contacts, phone numbers, messages, etc), and will NOT send any MMS without your approval. Also our game will not share your game status to any social network without your approval.We will not collect any of your private information. All information collected from our game is anonymous and will never have any information identifying you.

reviews.title: KAPOW my boredness away.  Characters are cute & funny.
reviews.comment: Great graphics. This is a very addicting game. Fun, simple, & hope to see more updates. No crash. Pls. add new settings & items in shop. Keep it up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice game!
reviews.comment: Hope the Location information can be remove..

reviews.title: Cool concept!
reviews.comment: Its great, only problem is i have FCs mid game and sometimes at the end. Using gs2. Make it compatible with tablets !

reviews.title: Lost my save
reviews.comment: Lost my save after the update. Would like to see more characters and mini games in future updates.

reviews.title: Great game! Brilliant idea!
reviews.comment: It is an amazing game that I have seen from the market! I deeply believe the game will impact every user all over the world! Thanks for all non-sleeping developers. You are the best guys. ---- to all staffs :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic game. Such a cool, new & fresh take on messaging your friends. Great music & graphics. Love it. Very addictive. Can\'t wait for new levels.
